alert.note: Alert for Central Somerset; Northern Franklin; Northern Oxford; Southern Franklin; Southern Oxford (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 25 at 3:01PM EST until November 26 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...In Maine, Central Somerset, Northern Franklin, Northern Oxford, Southern Franklin, and Southern Oxford Counties. In New Hampshire, Northern Carroll, Northern Coos, Northern Grafton, Southern Carroll, and Southern Coos Counties. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 10 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Central Somerset; Northern Franklin; Northern Oxford; Southern Franklin; Southern Oxford
